programme.desc: Suatu hari, Mentari diterima sebagai pembantu rumah di rumah Angkasa. Walaupun ibu Angkasa melarang Angkasa dari mengambil Mentari sebagai pembantu rumah, Angkasa tetap menyuruh Mentari untuk membersihkan bilik yang bersepah di rumah atau pejabatnya.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep62
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep163
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kamu Memang OB Tapi Kamu Ratu DiHatiku
programme.desc: Suatu hari, Mentari diterima sebagai pembantu rumah di rumah Angkasa. Walaupun ibu Angkasa melarang Angkasa dari mengambil Mentari sebagai pembantu rumah, Angkasa tetap menyuruh Mentari untuk membersihkan bilik yang bersepah di rumah atau pejabatnya.

programme.title: Habis Dia Terbitlah Kamu
programme.desc: Kedatangan Dafa di hadapan Rani menimbulkan masalah untuk Rani, bagaimana tidak? Ternyata Dafa melarikan diri ke bengkel tempat Rani bekerja untuk menghindari pacar bekas gadis yang pernah dekat dengannya. Akibatnya, Rani terpaksa membantu Dafa melarikan diri.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep9
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep80
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Aku Yang Dinikahi, Dia Yang Dinafkahi
programme.desc: Maura nampaknya membuat kesalahan dalam memilih suami seperti Marchel yang lebih memperhatikan bekas isterinya yang bernama Lidya. Dengan berbohong tentang penyakit kanser, Lidya berjaya merampas harta Marchel. Sebenarnya Maura mengetahui tentang rancangan licik Lidya dan mencuba untuk membongkarinya, tetapi Marchel masih mempercayai Lidya. Bagaimanakah kelanjutan kisah keluarga Maura dan March

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep10
programme.desc: Siri ini diarahkan oleh Gita Asmara dan dibintangi oleh Aliando Syarief, Sitha Marino, dan Erdin Werdrayana. Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga yang menghalang hubungan mereka. Darwin telah ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya sejak kecil.

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Il Mare
programme.desc: A young woman from 1999 and a young man from 1997 begin a parallel-time love story separated by a span of two years when they start to receive each other's letters in the mailbox.

programme.title: Good Deal

programme.title: Mystery In The Box Ep5
programme.desc: All-celebrities immersive storyline experience variety show; revolving around the elements of gaming and comedy, it is based on current social hot topics to create different game themes. In a boxed space, a group of mysterious players need to gradually uncover the truth of the story through various bizarre, hilarious, and twisted situations, break free from the box, and embark on a unique journey of spiritual healing.

programme.title: First In Last Out Ep14
programme.desc: Six guests, including Zhang Han, Wei Da Xun, Zhang Bin Bin, Qin Xiao Xian, Zhang Yan Qi, and Zhang Jia Yuan, are invited to be the Fire Freshmen at the local fire station to live and train with the firefighters, unlocking their rescue skills and sharing an unforgettable firefighting experience together.

programme.title: Student Ep19
programme.desc: A tailor-made variety show for students. 12 students from different countries and subjects are invited in each episode to discuss various topics. Hosts include Ken Lin, Nadow Lin, and Amber An.

programme.title: Youngster Story Tours Ep1

programme.title: Maybe You Are Falling In Love Ep5
programme.desc: With a one-day time limit, male and female guests gather in three everyday life scenes to connect with and understand each other. Breaking the typical dating show format, host Zhang Chunye and the ""Support Team"" (Jam Hsiao, Dazhang Wei, Pu Yixing, Cai Guoqing, and Wang Yaoqing) witness the growing emotions between guests, accompanying them through the sweetness and setbacks of their emotional journey.

programme.title: Love Actually Season 2 Ep14
programme.desc: Continuing the pattern of last season, a group of young men and women over the age of 30 are invited to live in an apartment for one month. programme.title: Slam Dunk Teenager Season 2 Ep1

programme.title: The Delicacy Ep3

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep61
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4882
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1918
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3426
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2912
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1043
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep11
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep289290
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep499
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep1617
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep3738
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep62
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1919
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep45
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: My Wife is a Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Natalie Yao Meng stars as the gambling queen, Ying Ying, who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition. But before the competition she is betrayed by her fianc and left for dead. Rescued by a young man called Gerrard (Nick Cheung) but suffering from amnesia, Ying Ying, must recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: The New Legend of Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin disciple Hong Xi Guan is tasked to escort the five young shaolin legends who have treasure maps tattooed on their backs to the base of the Anti-Qing Society. They are targeted and hunted by an assassin sent by the Qing government. Can Hong finally keep them safe and complete his mission?

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her masters Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fans daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fans friend along the way.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.desc: When Howard buys a scooter like the one he had years ago, he and Raj relive their glory days; Meanwhile, Amy has a meltdown over possibly winning a Nobel.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 20
programme.desc: While Penny encourages Leonard to stand up for himself in a physics study, Raj is worried after publishing a paper suggesting he may have discovered alien life.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 21
programme.desc: When Barry Kripke finds proof that Dr. Pemberton plagiarized his thesis in college, Sheldon and Amy try to take the high road in their quest for the Nobel Prize.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 22
programme.desc: Leonard is pleasantly surprised when his mother (CHRISTINE BARANSKI) visits and is genuinely kind toward him - until he finds out the real reason she's there.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 23
programme.desc: Everything changes as Sheldon and Amy await big news in the first of a two-part series finale.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 5
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke use the power of the sun to hack a juicy burger.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: For Becky and Hunter, life is all about conquering fears and pushing limits. After climbing 2,000 feet to the top of a remote, abandoned radio tower, they find themselves stranded with no way down.

programme.title: Rock Of Ages
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Broadway musical about two people who fall in love whilst pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 6
programme.desc: In a day filled with explosive surprises, Team Brandori looks for a big win as the Alvarado Brothers take a gamble and let the pros get under their skin. A fiery contraption has T Money wondering if he scored big or will go down in flames.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori go for the gold - but find something even better. Jesse takes a swing at Team Brandori, while T- Money does some dangerous bidding of his own. But when the dust settles, will Scott and Chrissy drive away with the golden prize?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 8
programme.desc: In one of the most unusual big money auctions yet, Sean auctions the contents of abandoned big-rigs. Scott and Jesse go head to head over a space age haul, while Brandon and Lori take a chance on a battle-ready rig. Meanwhile, Papa Bear goes all in for some vintage fun stuff - and he isn't in the mood to play games.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 9
programme.desc: It's wheels up for Papa Bear when he takes a gamble on a mysterious covered item. Meanwhile, the newcomer Alvarado brothers find an unusual collectible hiding in plain sight -- but are they going to flush their money down the toilet? And Brandon andLori find out whether a pet bin will turn out to be their best friend.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 10
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 11
programme.desc: Sheldon acts as Marys spy when hes forced to spend the night at church for a youth lock-in. Meanwhile, Georgie finds himself attracted to an older woman named Mandy (guest star Emily Osment).

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 12
programme.desc: Sheldon attends his first comic book convention and Mary tries selling make-up. JASON ALEXANDER and WENDIE MALICK return as Gene Lundy and President Hagemeyer respectively.

programme.title: Person Of Interest S4 18
programme.desc: Reese must protect a bounty hunter who refuses to let the threat to her life get in the way of tracking her target. And Finch sets his Hong Kong plan in motion.

programme.title: Person Of Interest S4 19
programme.desc: Reese and Finch scramble to protect a software CEO when his behavior becomes increasingly erratic, following a hacker attack that reveals all his secrets and unravels his life.

programme.title: Person Of Interest S4 20
programme.desc: Reese finds himself on a perilous personal journey when he takes it upon himself to honor Detective Carters memory by attempting to solve a cold homicide case she was never able to close.

programme.title: Person Of Interest S4 21
programme.desc: Reese and Fusco get caught in the crosshairs of a war between rival crime bosses Elias and Dominic, while Finch and Root find a clue to Shaws possible whereabouts.

programme.title: Person Of Interest S4 22
programme.desc: Finch & Root race to save The Machine, which has been located by its rival, Samaritan, while Reese is caught in the middle of the war between rival crimes bosses Elias and Dominic.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Back with the Packs Ep1
programme.desc: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Drakensberg: Barrier of Spears Ep1
programme.desc: This documentary looks at the wildlife of The Drakensberg Mountain range. We take a look at how creatures survive in the hostile landscape, from the highest peaks to the rolling grasslands below.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts Ep3
programme.desc: A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - De Hoop: Place of Hope Ep5
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africas wilderness.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Deer Ep13
programme.desc: In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Hunting with the Manzi Ep2
programme.desc: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Whales Ep14
programme.desc: Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. Its an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. Theyre soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - Indonesia: Islands of Fire Ep1
programme.desc: With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Gardens in the Clouds Ep2
programme.desc: The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured peoples imagination. Its a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom Ep4
programme.desc: For most of the year its a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Kogelberg Ep6
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Capes protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Lion Daycare Ep5
programme.desc: Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Hunting with the Manzi Ep2
programme.desc: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - The Missing Manzi Ep3
programme.desc: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Head & Neck Ep1
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Weighs and Means Ep6
programme.desc: Beni faces his weigh-in while Alba is back in isolation. Pujon reclaims his position as gang leader. A team heads out to rescue an infant orangutan. And an unwelcome visitor prompts the staff to introduce a cautionary lesson in snake awareness.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Elephant Story Ep3
programme.desc: Once abundant on the continent, elephant populations have been drastically reduced by hunting for ivory and meat in the last 200 years. Yet there are pockets of hope for these gentle giants, found in dedicated elephant conservation reserves like Addo Elephant Park and Tembe Elephant Park in South Africa. Protected from poachers within the parks, elephant numbers are growing.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Paul attends a quinceaera birthday party in Baja California, tries fresh cactus in Milpa Alta and insects in Oaxaca, and visits one of Mexico's best restaurants on the Yucatn Peninsula.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollino, Basilicata - Gino explores the largest national park in Italy on horseback. This is the hilliest region where descendants of Albanian refugees from 500 years ago live in splendid isolation in the smallest village in Pollino National Park, San Paolo Albanese.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Nigella bakes a fluffy, white, no-knead bread, which she uses to sandwich her crispy fried chicken, accompanied by pickles and kimchi.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how to make an amazing pie using chicken thighs and canned mushroom soup; a sumptuous mushroom risotto and a veggie treat, a squash Bhaji burger and flatbread. Miguel Barclay shows us how to make a very low cost Aubergine Parmigiana.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Something for Everyone - Rachel goes on a historical and spiritual journey to discover chocolate's universal appeal. Her enticing recipes include chewy, crunchy chocolate cookies.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S5 Ep6
programme.desc: Borgo Egnazia, Italy - Monica and Rob work behind the scenes of a hotel built to resemble an entire ancient Italian village. They discover how you deliver real Italy within a carefully designed replica.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Hemal and Kapila - Two architects compete using virtual reality to win the opportunity to remodel a four-bedroom house near Stockport. But which option will the owners choose?

programme.title: Grand Designs S20 Ep6
programme.desc: In Dunstable, John and his wife Helen demolish an old, dilapidated house and in its place build a million-pound, high-tech, accessible glass pavilion, complete with wildlife garden.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Custard Week - It's custard week on The Great South African Bake Off and the bakers kick things off with a Franginpane Tart with Crme Anglaise. For their technical, Siba tasks them with producing a South African favourite - custard-filled doughnuts. The Showstopper sees the bakers making their own Bavarian Cream Gateaux.

programme.desc: Pollino, Basilicata - Gino explores the largest national park in Italy on horseback. This is the hilliest region where descendants of Albanian refugees from 500 years ago live in splendid isolation in the smallest village in Pollino National Park, San Paolo Albanese.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S14 Ep7
programme.desc: Dessert Week: The bakers take on Creme Caramels and a Meringue Bombe. Who will peak and who will wobble?

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S31 Ep12
programme.desc: Together on Graham's sofa tonight: "The Crown" star Dominic West, taking the lead in the Arthur Miller masterpiece "A View From The Bridge"; "Game of Thrones" star Jacob Anderson, talking about the Anne Rice series "Interview With The Vampire"; and much-loved comic and presenter Alan Carr. With music from U.S. singer-songwriter Teddy Swims, who performs his single "Lose Control".

programme.title: Gordon, Gino and Fred's Road Trip S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Viva Espaa: Fiesta Forever - Next stop Galicia, north-west Spain, where Gordon gets in touch with his Celtic roots. Also, they'll catch clams in Cambados and taste an incredible local delicacy: goose barnacles.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In Suffolk, Emma and Nick help Pete and Louise who are struggling to work from home and deal with the needs of their two kids. Can the team create some much-needed individual space for the family?
